mapper.sql: topid, md5, sortindex, content, toprank, linkurl, imageurl, sourceid, source, posttime, createtime, updatetime, status, visits, noteint, notestring, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from top_news
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into top_news (topid, md5, sortindex, content, toprank, linkurl, imageurl, sourceid, source, posttime, createtime, updatetime, status, visits, noteint, notestring, remark) values (#{topid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toprank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{visits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noteint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notestring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update top_news
topid = #{record.topid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
md5 = #{record.md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortindex = #{record.sortindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toprank = #{record.toprank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
linkurl = #{record.linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imageurl = #{record.imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sourceid = #{record.sourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source = #{record.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
posttime = #{record.posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
visits = #{record.visits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
noteint = #{record.noteint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
notestring = #{record.notestring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update top_news set topid = #{record.topid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, md5 = #{record.md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortindex = #{record.sortindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toprank = #{record.toprank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, linkurl = #{record.linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imageurl = #{record.imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceid = #{record.sourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source = #{record.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, posttime = #{record.posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, visits = #{record.visits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, noteint = #{record.noteint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notestring = #{record.notestring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortindex = #{sortindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toprank = #{toprank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
linkurl = #{linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imageurl = #{imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sourceid = #{sourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
posttime = #{posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
visits = #{visits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
noteint = #{noteint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
notestring = #{notestring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where topid = #{topid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update top_news set md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortindex = #{sortindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toprank = #{toprank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, linkurl = #{linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imageurl = #{imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceid = #{sourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, posttime = #{posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, visits = #{visits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, noteint = #{noteint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notestring = #{notestring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where topid = #{topid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM top_news
AND topid = #{topid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND content LIKE '%${content}%'
AND sourceid > #{sourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER} * 100 AND sourceid < (#{sourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}+1) * 100
AND source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND status = 1
ORDER BY createtime DESC
